page.title: 16Mr. Broughton (1 of 2)
page.content: {"HOW LONG HAVE YOU WORKED HERE?" 'I GOT THIS PUB OVER A YEAR AGO.' {"WHAT SORT OF SERVICES DO YOU OFFER?" '5 double bedrooms, a bar that sells beers, wines and spirits, and a restaurant.' {"HOW IMPORTANT IS THE TOURIST TRADE?" 'The best way to describe it is icing on the cake. There are quite a lot of licensed premises in Coltishall so there is insufficient local trade to go around. We get a lot of people come out of Norwich particularly from the Sprowston and Eaton areas of the city. It is one of the places you can drive into and see a fair stretch of the river. The holiday makers give us a long season, help us in our business.' {"HAVE YOU GOT RIVER FRONTAGE?" 'No I have not. The common has free moorage for 24 hours.' (cont.)
